text:
#GetBackToLife by getting the #COVID19 #Vaccine. #ClarkCounty and North Las #Vegas hosting a pop-up clinic Saturday at our MLK Senior Ctr. Book appointments at https://t.co/NHlNP1GqTr. 

This in Cmsr. @WillMcCurdyII's district and part of his work with the @backtolifeSNV effort. https://t.co/fZd0LpxLr9
